message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. I hope you'll accept this offer, Bob!
Alice, your offer was quite greedy. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the clock is ticking and the money is shrinking!
Bob, let's compromise. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share, but 60/40 is too much in your favor. How about 55/45?
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to the deadline. I'm offering you 4800, which is more than you would have gotten last round.  Don't be greedy, let's close this deal!
